sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from "react"; export class OrdersRow extends Component { calcTotal = (products) => products.reduce((total, p) => total += p.quantity * p.product.price, 0).toFixed(2) getShipping = (order) => order.shipped ? : render = () => { this.props.order.id } {this.props.order.name} { this.props.order.email } ${ this.calcTotal(this.props.order.products) } }
